title: Martin Van Buren National Historic Site: Camping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Camping              Camping         The Catskill Mountains provide a beautiful backdrop for camping in Columbia County.   In scenic Columbia County there are many places to choose from when it comes to camping.  Click the links below to find out more. http://www.hikercentral.com/campcounty/New_York_Columbia.html http://columbiacountytourism.org/accommodations-columbia-county
